title: "Baidu-Backed Jidu Auto Sets Up Supply Team Early Amid Global Chip Shortage"
excerpt: "Jidu Auto, a joint venture of Chinese tech giant Baidu and carmaker Geely Holding Group, has formed a special team usually not set up until the eve of mass production to make sure its development and output plans are not derailed by the global chip shortage."
